api_list.api_description: Fetches a single character by ID.
Fetch a specific person by ID or search for people.

optional_parameters.name: resource_id
optional_parameters.description: The specific ID of the person resource.

query: Who is Rick Sanchez from the Rick and Morty universe and who is Luke Skywalker in the Star Wars universe?

api_list.api_description: Fetches all episodes, with filtering options.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter for names containing this string.

api_list.api_description: Fetch film resources or a specific film.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter film resources.

query: Can you tell me about the 'Pilot' episode from Rick and Morty and about 'A New Hope' from Star Wars?

api_list.api_description: Fetches all locations, with filtering options.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter for names containing this string.

api_list.api_description: Fetch planets resources or a specific planet.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter planet resources.

query: What information can you provide about Earth in the Rick and Morty universe and Tatooine in the Star Wars universe?
